event_purpose: A datathon to demonstrate Smart City ideas using City of Winnipeg Open Data datasets.
This training session takes on a journey through the goals, means and history of open data.

event_name: Hackathon: contributions of data on deforestations and land degradation
event_purpose: By doing this hackathon, I hope to realize a local deforestation map and registering land degradations areas due to disasters, which can help locals students and researchers to find that datas disponibility

event_name: HerData, HerFuture: Open Data Day 2026 Datathon
event_purpose: To empower women in data science and AI to collaboratively use open data to develop innovative, data-driven solutions addressing real-world social and economic challenges.
organisers: Women in. Data Science and AI Zambia

event_purpose: Open Data Hackathon 2026 is designed to turn Hudson Valley data into action with AI. Government agencies: pitch their challenges, get innovative solutions, hire emerging talent. Tech community: solve real problems, build your portfolio, launch careers—or startups. Professionals work alongside students. Hi-tech meets low-tech. One day of collaboration that creates implementable civic innovation. All skill levels welcome.

event_name: Les données ouvertes pour améliorer l’accès à l’eau potable dans la commune de Sinendé
event_purpose: Permettre aux citoyens et acteurs locaux d’analyser et d’utiliser les données ouvertes sur l’eau potable afin d’identifier les insuffisances et formuler des recommandations communautaires basées sur des preuves.
organisers: SU WUSUA DAA ONG, email: suwusuadaa@gmail.com

event_name: Lovableでオープンデータを使おう
event_purpose: 文章で指示するだけで、Webアプリやサービスの画面・機能を自動生成してくれる生成AIノーコードツールを体験
To open maps data for local cities
Encourage transparency, civic innovation, and collaboration between society and governments
place: Parque Tecnológico de Santos - Santos, SP

event_name: Open Data for Climate Action: Insights for Students
event_purpose: To build students’ understanding of open data and climate change, strengthen data literacy skills, and empower participants to access, analyze, and use open climate data to identify local environmental challenges and propose data-driven solutions for climate action

event_name: Open Data for Climate Change Action
event_purpose: Residents can identify climate risks in Ikosi-Ketu using data rather than assumptions by encouraging participants to develop data-informed ideas or actions relevant to Ikosi-Ketu.

event_name: Open Data for Transparent Governance & Public Services
event_purpose: We hope to empower citizens, CSOs, and media in Taraba State to use open data to track public spending, improve service delivery, and strengthen transparency and accountability in governance.
organisers: Name of Organisation: Initiative for Community and Human Development in Taraba (ICHD); Contact Email: ichd4u@gmail.com
place: The event will take place in Jalingo, Taraba State Capital, Northeast Nigeria.

event_name: Unlocking the Power of Open Data for Local Impact
event_purpose: We want to show how open data can help people and communities in Akwa Ibom make smarter decisions, solve local problems, and create opportunities for growth and positive change.

event_name: Water Data for Action: Leveraging Open Intelligence for Climate Resilience
event_purpose: To mark Open Data Day by promoting the use of open water data and intelligence to support evidence-based climate resilience, disaster risk reduction, and sustainable water governance in Somalia.

event_name: “¿Dónde quedó mi obra?” Taller para vigilar el presupuesto y las obras públicas desde tu colonia
event_purpose: Fortalecer la supervisión ciudadana mediante la capacitación en presupuesto y obras públicas, usando datos abiertos y herramientas tecnológicas para rastrear proyectos, comprender el uso de recursos y reportar irregularidades de forma informada.
organisers: Concejalía de la Alcaldía Miguel Hidalgo, movimiento.mh.concejalia@gmail.com
